15311.content:
"Milly... were you... peeping?" Shirley asked in an ambiguous tone.

"You can't really blame me. I told you awhile ago I thought you were a ten. You've filled out to be a desirable young woman," Milly started the response looking slightly away, but returned her gaze to her showering classmate when she noticed Shirley wasn't making any effort to cover up.

Shirley was blushing and had stopped covering herself in soap. "Well, if you are going be looking anyway, would you be willing to get my back?"

Milly was elated and stripped out of her school uniform with gusto. She moved a hamper to block the door, though it would not hold up to much force if someone wanted to get it. While she was bent over pushing it, Milly was unable to resist the urge to admire Milly's nude form.

In past years, she had been envious of her long friendship with Lulu and combined with her voluptuous build will lead him to fall for the Student Council President. Since his even older friend, Suzaku Kururugi had enrolled, Lelouch had seemed even more distant from her. She wondered if they were having a relationship; or maybe that was wishful thinking (a bisexual Lulu would be more attainable than an asexual one); or maybe it was projecting--

Shirley was abruptly interrupted from her thoughts by Milly's mischievous hands. She had entered the shower and immediately began to tickle her armpits. Shirley laughed loudly and only made the pretense of resisting her new shower mate. Milly was taking much joy as the tickler and the view of Shirley's jiggling jugs.

As Shirley continued to laugh and make mock protest, Milly moved her hands down to tickle her taunt sides and stomach. "On closer appraisal, ten out of ten might be a bit low for you, babe," Milly flirted.

"Milly, I don't want all the baby oil taken off just yet." Then, summoning up her courage, she closed her eyes and kissed Milly on her sensual lips.

The two young ladies made out for a long time, breaking to kiss each other else where or to grope each others breasts, cheeks, and thighs. Milly was just about to take it further when Shirley stopped her.

"Wait, Milly. I don't know about this. Maybe I shouldn't go to far with this and we could tickle each other instead," Shirley said with indecision in her voice.

Milly couldn't help but sigh. "I don't want to pressure you, but it will be intense tickling if we do that. Which do you prefer?"

15313.content:
Milly hadn't earned a reputation for pushing the transgressing boundaries for nothing and placing her on guard for Shirley's modesty was the proverbial fox guarding the hen house. Predictably, the vixen was licking her lips at the defenseless chick.

Disrobing quickly and quietly to the buff, she sneaked up to her target. "Gotcha!" Milly shouted and took hold of her and brought her down.

"Milly, what the--" Shirley began as her close friend and senpai pinned her arms back with her long, shapely legs and tickled her sides.

Shirley laughed hard and asked insincerely for Milly to stop. Milly was enjoying the tickling too much to pay much attention, and was remembering a similar occasion recently where her, Shirley and Nina had played with the often sickly Kallen Stadtfeld in a group bath. Too bad they had thought to tickle the buxom new member of the Student Council then, but she would just have to make up for it with the partly oiled up and naked Shirley.

It was in Milly's makeup as mischievous, fun-loving and spoiled sweet young lady to be a terrific tickler. She worked here fingers over Milly's comely and vulnerable body with a dexterity that had her hollering. Milly was pleased to note the different sounds and shimmying Shirley did when she tickled her feet, her tummy, her sides, and her pits. As was Milly's expected benefit, her victim's alluring fun bags shook in way that made Milly wish someone was recorded it for posterity.

When Shirley, who had the lungs that made her an exceptional member of the Swimming Club, was finally out of breath and was tapping out, the Student Council President was merciful. She ceased tickling Milly's firm stomach, but topped off the skin-ship grope by burying her head into Milly's perky ta tas to motorboat her hands delivered dual spanks to the sides of her playmate's well-toned tush.

They both breathed deeply for a bit, which only furthered the eroticism for each other. "Milly, I'm going to pay you back for that," the soaked orange-head beauty finally stated.

Milly smiled, of course, and leaned over to swiftly kiss Shirley's lips. "Now's probably your best shot. Do your worst, honey bunch."
15313.title: Milly grabs Shirley and pins the smaller girls ...

1532.content:
Milly didn't want to be unkind, but the situation was amusing--especially the typically upbeat Shirley overreacting. Milly's laughter more surprised than angered her close friend.

"Milly... you didn't..." Shirley began to ask but Milly stopped her senpai putting a finger over her mouth as she moved closer t her.

"No, I wouldn't do that. If I did decide to have the pool filled with baby oil, I'd make it part of some erotic festival." Milly paused and moved her hand to her chin. "Hmm... which come to think of it..."

"I still don't think you should be laughing at me! I look awful. Imagine if... Lulu saw me like--like this," Shirley stammered. Her eyes were drier now, but she was visibly distraught still. Milly bit her lower lip, since her friend's melodrama was the funniest thing she had seen all day. She gently took Shirley shoulders.

"I like that idea too. Shirley, you're a well-built, swimsuit-clad babe who's coated in baby oil and looking for comfort. If that doesn't evoke a positive response from our composed Lulu, then I think we can rule out the straight rumors," she quipped and brushed aside some of Shirely's long, orange hair from her front.

Shirley's eyes widened and cheeks blushed. "You--you think Lelouch really does swing that way?" Shirley had heard talk and sometimes wondered, but she didn't normally speak about her crush's sexual proclivities.

Milly quickly moved her friends open sides and stomach and began tickling her. "I'm teasing you, dear." Milly found her ordinarily ticklish classmate to be somehow even more receptive covered in oil. Milly laughed loudly and brought up her arms in protest. This was a blunder, as Milly seized the opportunity to tickle her vulnerable armpits.

Shortly, Shirley's eyes were crying again and she went to the floor breathing heavily. Milly pursued her down, and concluded the session with her friends feet. Milly moved over her and cupped Shirley's heaving, perky boobs. They felt even better than the playful grope she had given her during the cat girl party.

"A couple of things, sweetie. First, I've known the secretive Lulu longer than anyone except Nana. In my opinion, he's more "a-" than "hetero-", "homo-", "bi-" or other. But I think that doesn't mean someone like you can't defrost the ice prince. And second," Milly gently fondled Shirley's oily funbags. She squeaked and blushed even deeper, but didn't try to resist in anyway.

"I always thought exclusive straight or gay wasn't that fun." Milly concluded her points by motorboating Shirley, causing her to laugh again. Milly lifted her head and looked to Shirley to see what she had decided to do.
1532.title: Does Milly laugh?

info.brief_description: The ladies of Code Geass are VERY ticklish.
info.description:
This is a series of random interactive tales where you pick a girl from Code Geass, and have her get tickled. These are the rules.

1: No deaths of females.

2: No rape

3: No toilet stuff

4: No yaoi (Yuri is encouraged though.)

5: No ending the story.
info.pretty_title: Code Geass: Tickling of the ladies
